description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from United States vs Brazil in the Friendlies Women
title: United States vs Brazil: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head
title_page: United States vs Brazil: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 7 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Yazmeen Ryan (USA) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Ashley Hatch.
Post
Attempt blocked. Adriana (Brazil) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Duda Sampaio.
Post
Attempt saved. Ashley Hatch (USA) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner.
